original_title: ViewSonic launches professional color monitor for designers and content creators
original_body_lines: ViewSonic Corp., a leading global provider of visual solutions, has launched the ColorPro™ VP76 premium monitor series in Sri Lanka, designed for content creators in fields such as photography, design, video editing, and animation. These monitors offer precise color accuracy and come equipped with an extended ColorPro™ Wheel for OSD settings, photo and video editing software, and color calibration. The monitors are now available for purchase on ViewSonic’s website and flagship store in Sri Lanka.

The ColorPro™ VP76 Series monitor has received various global awards for its design, user experience, and features, including the iF Design Award 2021, GOOD DESIGN AWARD 2021, and Wallpaper* Magazine’s inaugural Smart Space Award 2021 for the ‘Smartest Design + Tech Collaboration’ category. Its exclusive ColorPro™ Wheel, along with other design-enhanced features, provides instant access to editing software, accurate color calibration, and OSD settings, as well as deeper screen immersion through the detachable Magnetic Shading Hood and built-in ambient backstage light. This makes it a perfect tool for videographers and pro-colorists.
